title: Button Status
text: It is possible to set button color whith status attribute. Default value is basic.

title: Card Size
text: Card can have different sizes, it's possible to set its size using size attribute. The available size are: SMALL , MEDIUM , LARGE and EXTRA_LARGE .

title: Accordion Multi
text: The multi attribute allows to show more than one card at the same time.

title: Spinner Diameter
text: It's possible to add diameter attribute inside the component to set the spinner dimensions. Default diameter is 50.

title: Stepper Linear
text: The linear attribute only permits sequential navigation.For example it's not possible to go to step three without pass trough step two.

title: Tooltip Position
text: It is possible set tooltip position whith bzTooltipPosition attribute. (Default value of position is top)

title: Dialog Result
text: Subscribing to BzDialogService.showDialog(message) it is possible to recive the result when the dialog is closed

title: Multiple Dropdown
text: It can be used as multi-dropdown if you add multi attribute to component. In this case, it propagates arrays.

title: Checkbox Status
text: It is possible to set checkbox border color whith status attribute. Default value is basic.
